data.expected_result: The same behavior as if you type invalid invite : a "Unknown invite" toast
data.short_description: Submitting an empty text field in "Join server with invite link" screen will show an expired invite with a Network error toast
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll all the way down in your server list - Tap the + button - Tap "Join server with invite link"  - Without writing anything in the textbox, tap Join at the top right
